short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you debug Yorkie.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can access the "Yorkie üêæ" panel within the Chrome Developer Tools. Here's an overview of the Key features:

Left Tab: Document
- Instant access to document keys.
- Visualize the rootObject structure for a comprehensive understanding.

CRDT insights
- Clearly display data types for each CRDTElement using intuitive icons and informative tooltips.
- Click on any CRDTElement to unveil datatype-specific details tailored to your debugging needs.

View Options
- By default, enjoy a JSON view for quick analysis.
- Explore tree data types with an interactive graph view, offering a deeper understanding of the data structure.
